definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一样，马白夫公公也认为植物是有灵魂的。

sentences.english: She wanted to be loved by her parents-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 女孩很想得到公公婆婆的喜爱。

sentences.english: Santa Claus suddenly remembered the elk hung bells around his neck.
sentences.chinese: 突然想起圣诞老公公的麋鹿脖子上挂着的铃铛。

sentences.english: We went back home last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 上个周末，去公公婆婆家。

sentences.english: After her father-in-law’s “execution,” a young man arrives.
sentences.chinese: 她的公公“行刑”完，家里来了一个年轻男人。

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf raised his head. He saw a gardener passing, and inquired
Santa needs to know if the sun will produce a huge amount of radiation on December 24th.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老公公问姚平安夜那天会不会有大量的太阳辐射。

sentences.english: However, this image of Santa Claus has evolved over the years.
sentences.chinese: 然而，圣诞老公公的形象可是逐年发展来的喔。

sentences.english: Father Christmas in the department stores are especially adored by kids.
sentences.chinese: 百货公司里的圣诞老公公特别受到孩子们的喜爱。

sentences.english: Suddenly DanSi aram kneeling on the seurat, say supplications before a thing which.
sentences.chinese: 突然丹丝兰跪在了亚修拉面前，说出恳求公公一件事。

sentences.english: According to the post, one guest at the wedding banquet insisted that the father-in-law should kiss the bride.
sentences.chinese: 视频中，婚宴上的一名宾客坚持要这位公公亲新娘。

sentences.english: Marius was the brass vase, while Father Gillenormand was the iron pot.
sentences.chinese: 马吕斯是铜瓶，而吉诺曼公公是铁钵。

sentences.english: John is Jenny's and Derick's father-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 约翰是珍妮的公公和德克立的岳父。

sentences.english: A discussion between Grape and Lee begins.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄和公公进行了一场对话。

sentences.english: Grape realizes her father-in-law should have come out from his underground chamber two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 听到这些葡萄才知道，公公在两年前就能搬出地下了。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
I/me/my/(often used in early vernacular literature)
erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]
